name: Basem Emara
description: Basem is a mobile and software IT professional with over 12 years of experience as an architect, developer, and consultant for dozens of projects that span over various industries for Fortune 500 enterprises, government agencies, and startups. In 2014, Basem brought his vast knowledge and experiences to Swift and helped pioneer the language to build scalable enterprise iOS & watchOS apps, later providing mentorship courses at https://iosmentor.io.
